pr_title: Option to create separate async and sync clients

timeline.message: Option to create separate async and sync clients

timeline.bodyText:
@srnagar Any idea why this get changed?
I've got lots of unnecessary import (import of files in exact same package) for new code generated.
E.g.
In com.azure.management.resources.AliasType import com.azure.management.resources.AliasPathType.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText:
Tried with some logging,
package_Keyword is com.azure.management.resources
import_Keyword is com.azure.management.resources.AliasPathType
So basically import_Keyword is package + class. equals will not work here.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: @weidongxu-microsoft I see the issue here. I was going for com.azure.storage classes to be able to import com.azure.storage.implementation. So, startsWith also doesn't work. I will add a fix to this issue. Thanks for reporting!
replies.author: srnagar
